name: Star Saver (itch)
description:
Description

After picking up the star, the ancient ruins suddenly started to crumble. Help our hero Ethan get out of place and save the star.
Pay attention to the enviroment and the holes in it. Some holes are dangerous, but some will help you get through the obstacles!

Star Saver is an infinite runner with a fun and intuitive gameplay, created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1.

Commands:

- Space: jump

Team: Artist:
